metadata.title: CVE-2017-9998 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The _dwarf_decode_s_leb128_chk function in dwarf_leb.c in libdwarf through 2017-06-28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
